descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]WANTED: Compatibility fixes.
[size=3]Since I am no longer updating my mods (as I am no longer using Skyrim) I need compatibility fixes for vampire and wearwold overhaul mods, and dual sheath redux, along with any other mods of the like.[/size]

UPDATE INFORMATION:[/b][/size] I don't really have time to work on this race anymore. If you'd like to help with development, send me a message. I'll let someone else take over on part of the project.

[size=5][color=#FF0000][b]Important things and information[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] Is needed for all features!

I need assistance with fixing model bugs since I am poor at modeling. Contact me if you wish to help fix problems. See bottom for details.

Horns are under both Facial hair and Scars, so you can pick between them or have both at once. Note that ones under scars are buggy.

If you want to repalce the body mesh, Body meshes are stored in Data\meshes\Kaleen\Body and textures are stored in Data\textures\actors\character\kaleen.

[b]If you find problems, report them in detail. It crashes is not detail.[/b]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/8464-1-1368513837.jpg[/img]
[color=#FF0000][b]_______Ability_____[/b][/color]
Racial Ability. 25% resistance to Poison and disease along with 5% magic reduction. Power, Paralyzing shock, paralyzes targets in a certain area for five seconds and deals minor shock damage.
[color=#FF0000][b]__________Mini Lore Q&A_____________[/b][/color]
Q: How long do Kaleen live for?
A: About a thousand years, give or take a few decades.

Q: What are their abilities like?
A:The race is magic oriented, though they are proficient with melee combat and are quite agile, though once more, their true strength is in magic.

Only questions I've gotten so far, as more in the comments.

[color=#FF0000][b]__________To Do and MISC_____________[/b][/color]
To do includes face markings, more hair colors, more eye colors and types, more skin color too.

[color=#FF0000][b]_______Requirements____[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]You will now need Apachii hair in order to run this [/url]

[color=#FF0000][b]_____Credit___[/b][/color]
expired6978's race compatibility scrips and plugin.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url] By alt3rn1ty and
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] by navetsea For the body texture mix
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48329/?]Character Mod Resource Pack[/url] By Nuska - For the face textures.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female textures[/url] by hellosanta - Used for part of body.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character edit[/url] by tktk1
For the facegen.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP Body[/url] By dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488]Better Males[/url] By Chris57
Caliente Female Body and body slide.
and others.

[size=4][b]Recommended mods[/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/?]Race Menu Extender[/url]: You'll need this for most of the features. I strongly recommend it for best customization.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]:If you want more hair.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D24168%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Race Compatability[/url]:If you want vampire and wearwolf to work more correctly.

[color=#FF0000][b]_____BUGS/issues______[/b][/color]
Horns in scar slot sometimes get bright, this is due to their shadowing adjusting with the facial shadowing and shading.

[size=5][b]HELPFUL THINGS[/b][/size]

I added race compatibility which should fix wearwolf and Vampire problems as well as fix the incompletable quest. If not [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10770]Try One[/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13717]of These[/url]

[size=4]Help wanted.[/size] Need help with fixing model bugs, such as the shading issues with the horns and tail. Also someone more versed in transformations to take a look and make sure everything works right. If you can fix any problems, let me know.
author: Nouser

files.name: Tan body texture for natural tone
files.fileName: Tan body texture for natural tone-8464-3.rar
